item.title: Open Letter: Regarding the Residential Experience Review
item.author: Nick Voulvoulis,
item.description: *Dr Nick Voulvoulis is the Warden of Southwell & Bernard Sunley Hall, and Reader in Environmental Technology at the Centre for Environmental Policy. He has been the Warden of Southwell Hall since 2003 and Southwell & Bernard Sunley since 2011 when the halls merged. He was Subwarden and then â€¦
